title: Bots are annoying
body: Get your finger out of your arses and do something about it, reporting doesn't work, i have reported it and seen them a few days later doing the same thing. its getting real bad on the OCE server. i mean come on, u guys can do better than this.

replies.body: Bots don't swear so they dont get banned.
lol. You'd think they would've managed to do something about it after all this time, but nope. It's really just getting worse. I feel your pain.
